CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest exciton dissociation of the PffBB-14 - based device is anticipated to give rise to the best photovoltaic performance among these series of polymers.

Let's think step by step.
1. PffBB-14: This is the name of the material or polymer mentioned in the paragraph. It is the specific material that is anticipated to give the best photovoltaic performance.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. PffBB-14: This is the name of the material that is anticipated to give the best photovoltaic performance.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The highest exciton dissociation of the PffBB-14 - based device is anticipated to give rise to the best photovoltaic performance among these series of polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. The highest exciton dissociation: This refers to the maximum energy released when an exciton (an excited electron-hole pair) separates in a material. It is a physical property of the material.
2. The PffBB-14 - based device: This is a specific type of device, likely a photovoltaic device, that is based on the PffBB-14 polymer.
3. The best photovoltaic performance: This is a measure of how effectively the device converts light energy into electrical energy. It is a performance characteristic of the device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. The highest exciton dissociation (energy value related to material property)
2. The best photovoltaic performance (performance value related to material property)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to values of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| the highest exciton dissociation |
| the best photovoltaic performance |
